title: Public Programs compile (2002)
description: This compile created for the opening of ACMI at Federation Square 'Oct 2002 contains: 1. Digital studio: promo 1. 2. Digital studio: promo 2. 3. Digital storytelling: promo. 4. Get into dragons. 5. ACMI kids in space. 6. Map teasers 1: This little piggy went to market [excerpt]. 7. Map teasers 2: Lygon street [excerpt]. 8. Map teasers 3: Red line [excerpt]. 9. Small town cowboys. 10. Soon: a video haiku.
